summary: An ordinance granting permission to the Wauconda Investment Company to improve Ohio Avenue, from Dawson Street to Alaska Street; Utah Avenue from Hudson Street to Alaska Street; Alaska Street and Hudson Street, each from Ohio Avenue to Utah Avenue and East Marginal Way, from Dawson Street to a point one hundred twenty-seven (127) feet south thereof, by constructing temporary watermains therein at its own cost and expense under certain terms and conditions.
